definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang

sentences.english: Their children have been nicknamed the "rich second generation".
sentences.chinese: 企業家的孩子也得了外號“富二代”。

sentences.english: One major concern for a rich user interface is layout management.
sentences.chinese: 對於富用戶界面，一個重要的方面就是佈局管理。

sentences.english: Before being fermented, the white chunks of tofu are plump and pliant . How filling they look!
sentences.chinese: 泡製前的豆腐塊白鼓鼓的，富彈性，很有飽實感。

sentences.english: As a matter of meteorology, Mr Fugate has a point.
sentences.chinese: 從氣象學角度看，富蓋特先生有自己的觀點。

sentences.english: Rich client development doesn't have to come at your code's expense.
sentences.chinese: 富客戶機開發並不一定非要以複雜的代碼爲代價。

sentences.english: Don't have a lot of food that contains too much fat, such as butter.
sentences.chinese: 不要喫太多富合脂肪的食物，比如說黃油。

sentences.english: Have not heard a word " fortune-telling rich burn incense and poor, " saying it?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有聽過一句話“窮算命富燒香”這句話呀？

sentences.english: It took our rich dad only a few minutes to explain what assets and liabilities were.
sentences.chinese: 富爸爸於是花了幾分鐘向我們解釋什麼是資產和負債。

sentences.english: The discovery of gold in the valley will enrich the poor mountain area.
sentences.chinese: 山谷裏發現了黃金，這會使這個貧窮的山區富起來。

sentences.english: Even the emperor has straw-sandaled relatives.
Lymphedema is characterized by a regional accumulation of excessive amounts of interstitial protein-rich fluid.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴水腫的特點是過量間質性富蛋白液的局部積聚。

sentences.english: Toyama prefecture is rich in hot spring resources, and is also known for hot spring bath.
sentences.chinese: 富山縣有很好的溫泉資源，以泡溫泉著稱。

sentences.english: Piece of instrumental music in several movements, usually in chance style.
sentences.chinese: 富舞曲節奏的多樂章器樂曲。

sentences.english: Luo Fuhe, vice-chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC), attended the reception.
sentences.chinese: 全國政協副主席羅富和出席了此次招待會。

sentences.english: Saving money is a key skill to develop if you hope to get rich.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想變富，節約是一項必備的技能。

sentences.english: Central Pacific seamounts are mainly distribution areas of Co-rich crusts.
sentences.chinese: 中太平洋海區是富鈷結殼的主要分佈區。

definition: poor/destitute/to use up/to exhaust/thoroughly/extremely/(coll.) persistently and pointlessly
Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
the benevolent man cannot be rich (idiom, from Mencius). It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle than for a rich man to enter the kingdom of heaven (Matthew 19:24).
surname Fu/abbr. for Fujian province 福建省[Fu2 jian4 sheng3]
